Package com.ibm.mqttsample.utility

This package contains a J2SE Swing user interface for WMQTT as a sample application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConnOpts This class constructs the user interface dialog allowing the input of additional connect options as well as some usability options such as displaying a history of events and enabling persistence in the protocol.
LED This class manipulates pixels to display an LED with a glint effect on it.
MQTTFrame This class is the controlling class for the application.
MQTTHist MQTTHist is a simple dialog window which displays a history of messages received.
PubPanel This class creates a panel that contains all the components to do with sending publications.
SubPanel This class creates a panel that contains all the components to do with subscribing for and receiving publications.
 

Package com.ibm.mqttsample.utility Description

This package contains a J2SE Swing user interface for WMQTT as a sample application. The application exposes the full range of WMQTT protocol options through the user interface and may be used to send and receive character or binary data.
